snippet: The European Union will soon push back a deadline by which U.S. clearing houses need to comply with its rules, a source familiar with the matter said, taking the sting out of a dispute with America over how to regulate swaps....

headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Europe Eyes Longer Respite for U.S. Swaps Clearers: Source
headline.main: Exclusive-Europe Eyes Longer Respite for U.S. Swaps Clearers: Source

lead_paragraph: The European Union will soon push back a deadline by which U.S. clearing houses need to comply with its rules, a source familiar with the matter said, taking the sting out of a dispute with America over how to regulate swaps.
